summary: The remarkable story of The Weather Underground, radical activists of the 1970s, and of radical politics at its best and most disastrous.
cast: Lili Taylor|Pamela Z|Jim Lange|Evan White|Bernardine Dohrn|Mark Rudd|Brian Flanagan|David Gilbert|Bill Ayers|Naomi Jaffe|Todd Gitlin|Laura Whitehorn|Don Strickland|Kathleen Cleaver|Skip Andrew|L.D. Barkley|Ivan Boesky|Fidel Castro|Eldridge Cleaver|Bob Dylan|Jane Fonda|Gerald Ford|Theodore Gold|Billy Graham|Fred Hampton|Abbie Hoffman|Dustin Hoffman|George Jackson|Martin Luther King|Timothy Leary|Charles Manson|Zedong Mao|Walter Mondale|Richard Nixon|Ronald Reagan|James Robison|Evelle Younger
title: The Weather Underground
